funding-group.funding-statement: This study was primarily supported by intramural funds of the Instituto Leônidas e Maria Deane (ILMD/Fiocruz, Brazil). Additional support came from the Fiocruz-FAPEAM agreement, the Centro de Pesquisa René Rachou and the Vice-Presidência de Pesquisa e Laboratórios de Referência (CPqRR and VPPLR/Fiocruz, Brazil). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
